sentences.sContent: The refugees come across the border in vast numbers.
In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.
sentences.sCn: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

sentences.sContent: ...The vast bulk of the research shows that there may be a pause...
...000 laws and rules serve to exclude vast numbers of people from fully participating in American life...
...Some businesses will benefit but the vast bulk of the savings will be captured by workers...
...There are many examples of the vast harm that is caused when individuals forget or ignore the effect their dishonesty can have...

synos.tran: 广阔的；巨大的；大量的；巨额的
